name: Monozukuri Ventures
locations_freeform: New York, New York; Umekoji MArKEt 3F, 34 Suzaku Hozocho, Shimogyo-ku, Kyoto-shi, Kyoto-fu, 600-8846 Japan
description: Monozukuri Ventures is a venture capital firm based in Japan and North America specializing in hard tech. They aim to create a world where entrepreneurs and startups can quickly produce and sell high-quality products, even in small quantities. The firm provides essential resources such as investment, mentorship, prototyping know-how, manufacturing expertise, and community support to help founders deliver high-quality products to the market rapidly.

investment_stages.1: The firm invests in pre-seed, seed, and early-stage hard-tech startups in the US, Canada, and Japan.

investment_verticals.2: Consumer Health, Hardware, Medical Devices, TransportationTech, IoT, Robotics, ConstructionTech, Manufacturing, EnergyTech, DeepTech, Consumer Internet
investment_verticals.1: The firm focuses on various industry domains including healthcare, industrial IoT, climate change tech, cleantech, smart home, wearable technologies, sharing economy, agri-tech, AI and machine learning, robotics, space tech, and more.
